content:
4 Attributes

4.1 About the Attributes Appendix

This appendix gives you a list of attributes and links to the reference pages for the elements on which they appear. There are 269 distinctly-named attributes in revision e64bcedf9 of TEI P5 VersionÂ 4.5.0a of the TEI Guidelines.
